noResults.title: No governance actions found
noResults.description: Governance actions are searchable by their ID both CIP-105 (legacy) and CIP-129 formats, title and abstract contents.

outcome.label: Outcome
outcome.membersToBeAddedToCommittee: Members to be added to the Committee
outcome.membersToBeRemovedToCommittee: Members to be removed from the Committee
outcome.changeToTermsOfExistingMembers: Change to terms of existing members

submission.title: Submission Date
submission.description: The date when the governance action was submitted on-chain.

expired.title: Expiration Date
expired.label: Expired:
expired.paragraphOne: The date when the governance action will expiry if it doesn't reach ratification thresholds.
expired.paragraphTwo: IMPORTANT: If the governance action is ratified before the expiry date it will be considered ratified and it will not be available to vote on afterwards.

votes.title: Governance Action Voting Results
votes.votingNotAvailable: Voting for this action is not available for

proposalDiscussion.title: Proposal Discussion
proposalDiscussion.notFound: Discussion history unavailable for this action!

dataMissingErrors.dataMissingTooltipExplanation: Please click “View Details” for more information.

description.notVerifiable: GovTool uses external sources for Governance Action data, and these sources are maintained by the proposers of the Actions. This error means that the data stored by the Proposer does not match the data when the Governance Action was originally posted.
description.dataMissing: GovTool uses external sources for Governance Action data, and these sources are maintained by the proposers of the Actions. This error means that GovTool cannot locate the data on the URL specified when the Governance Action was originally posted.
description.incorrectFormat: GovTool uses external sources for Governance Action data, and these sources are maintained by the proposers of the Actions. This error means that the data stored by the Proposer does not match the data format as defined by the Cardano community.

message.notVerifiable: The data that was originally used when this Governance Action was created has changed.
message.dataMissing: The data that was originally used when this Governance Action was created has not been found.
message.incorrectFormat: The data that was originally used when this Governance Action was created has been formatted incorrectly.

loaders.loadingAbstract: Loading governance action abstract, Loading governance action abstract, Loading governance action abstract...
